children.value: Make multiple selections from a set of alternatives.
Bind the checked state of the checkbox through

props.code: <z-checkbox v-model="checked">checkbox</z-checkbox>

import { ref } from 'vue'
const checked = ref(true)

children.value: Checkboxes can be disabled by setting the

props.code: <z-checkbox v-model="checked" disabled>checkbox</z-checkbox>

children.value: and the checkbox will become square.

props.code:
<z-checkbox-group v-model="checked" shape="square">
   <z-checkbox name="a">checkbox a</z-checkbox>
   <z-checkbox name="b">checkbox b</z-checkbox>
</z-checkbox-group>

import { ref } from 'vue';
const checked = ref(['a', 'b']);

children.value: Set the icon color of the checked state through the

props.code: <z-checkbox v-model="checked" checked-color="#ee0a24">checkbox</z-checkbox>

children.value: The size of the icon can be customized through the

props.code: <z-checkbox v-model="checked" icon-size="48rpx">checkbox</z-checkbox>

children.value: to determine whether it is selected.

props.code:
<z-checkbox v-model="checked">
   Custom icon
   <template #icon>
     <image
       class="img-icon"
       :src="checked ? activeIcon : inactiveIcon"
     />
   </template>
</z-checkbox>

<style>
   .img-icon {
     width: 40rpx;
     height: 40rpx;
   }
</style>

children.value: to adjust the text position to the left side of the check box.

props.code: <z-checkbox v-model="checked" label-position="left">checkbox</z-checkbox>

children.value: attribute, clicking on content other than the icon will not trigger the checkbox toggle.

props.code: <z-checkbox v-model="checked" label-disabled>checkbox</z-checkbox>

children.value: Checkboxes can be used together with checkbox groups, which bind the checked state of the checkbox through the

props.code:
<z-checkbox-group v-model="checked">
   <z-checkbox name="a">checkbox a</z-checkbox>
   <z-checkbox name="b">checkbox b</z-checkbox>
</z-checkbox-group>

<z-checkbox-group v-model="checked" direction="horizontal">
   <z-checkbox name="a">checkbox a</z-checkbox>
   <z-checkbox name="b">checkbox b</z-checkbox>
</z-checkbox-group>

children.value: Limit the maximum number of options
The maximum number of options in a checkbox group can be limited through the

props.code:
<z-checkbox-group v-model="checked" :max="2">
   <z-checkbox name="a">checkbox a</z-checkbox>
   <z-checkbox name="b">checkbox b</z-checkbox>
   <z-checkbox name="c">checkbox c</z-checkbox>
</z-checkbox-group>

children.value: Selecting all and inverting selection can be achieved through the

props.code:
<z-checkbox-group v-model="checked" ref="checkboxGroup">
   <z-checkbox name="a">checkbox a</z-checkbox>
   <z-checkbox name="b">checkbox b</z-checkbox>
   <z-checkbox name="c">checkbox c</z-checkbox>
</z-checkbox-group>

<z-button type="primary" @click="checkAll">Select all</z-button>
<z-button type="primary" @click="toggleAll">Invert</z-button>

children.value: When used with the cell component, you need to introduce the
components and trigger the switch through the toggle method on the

props.code:
<z-checkbox-group v-model="checked">
   <z-cell-group inset>
     <z-cell
       v-for="(item, index) in list"
       clickable
       :key="item"
       :title="`Checkbox ${item}`"
       @click="toggle(index)"
     >
       <template #right-icon>
         <z-checkbox
           :name="item"
           :ref="el => checkboxRefs[index] = el"
           @click.stop
         />
       </template>
     </z-cell>
   </z-cell-group>
</z-checkbox-group>

children.value: to set whether the checkbox is in an indeterminate state.

props.code:
<z-checkbox
   v-model="isCheckAll"
   :indeterminate="isIndeterminate"
   @change="checkAllChange"
>
   select all
</z-checkbox>

<z-checkbox-group v-model="checkedResult" @change="checkedResultChange">
   <z-checkbox v-for="item in list" :key="item" :name="item">
     Checkbox {{ item }}
   </z-checkbox>
</z-checkbox-group>

children.value: Identifier, usually a unique string or number
Whether to disable checkbox text clicks
Whether to bind to the checkbox group
Whether it is an indeterminate state
Icon size for all checkboxes, default unit is
The checked state color of all checkboxes
Event triggered when the binding value changes
Triggered when the checkbox is clicked
Event triggered when the binding value changes
Through ref, you can get the CheckboxGroup instance and call the instance method.
to uncheck, pass no parameter to negate
// Invert all selections and skip disabled checkboxes
// Select all and skip disabled checkboxes
Through ref, you can get the Checkbox instance and call the instance method.
to deselect, and pass no parameter to negate
The component provides the following CSS variables, which can be used to customize styles. For usage, please refer to

html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}

children.text: Limit the maximum number of options
